openTree.summary: function to get array to fill the tree component

arguments.name: path
arguments.description: given path of the file selected

arguments.name: id_path
arguments.description: path  given id_path of the directory

arguments.name: type
arguments.description: type given in order to fill the tree

arguments.description: id of the path to get

arguments.name: withPath
arguments.description: ath  adds the full path to the results

getLangsIds.name: getLangsIds
getLangsIds.summary: Returns an array including the ids of the languages for which the project is configured or creates the options for the configured languages
getLangsIds.description: ( the arraay contains the id_alias of the options corresponding to the real option of the language)

description_parts.content: ( the arraay contains the id_alias of the options corresponding to the real option of the language)

getPrimariesLangs.summary: Returns languages that have primary in cfg

createsLangOptions.name: createsLangOptions
createsLangOptions.summary: Creates the children of the option lang, if no arguments is given it uses the array of primaries languages

arguments.description: The repository's name (code) or the repository's configuration
